Detailed Description

Implementation of PciIdsVendor::store_db().

Date:
Thu Jul 29 19:39:05 2010

Contains the implementation of PciIdsVendor::store_db() function which updates/stores PCI IDs device codes to database.

Correct quotes of provided string for SQL statement.

Change quotes in a string from (") to (\") so that the SQL statements work properly.
